data.title: Midnight Secrets: Hidden Hexes
data.statement:
`
   ,_        It's midnight.
 ,'  ´\,_    There's papers on your desk.
 |_,-'_)     Phrases, numbers... what could this mean?
 /##c '\  (  
' |'  -{.  ) Something with hexadecimals, maybe?
  /\__-' \[] 
 /´-_´\      You decide to turn your computer on and
 '     \     create a program to decipher this enigma.
`


Select all hexadecimal digits ({{a}} to {{f}}) inside [[message]].

For each [[i]]-th hexadecimal digit found, add its decimal value to the corresponding [[i]]-th value in [[keys]], which is a decimal value.

Then, interpret each number as a character code and output the corresponding ASCII characters joined as a single string.
`
            ______
         .-'      ´-.        Example
       .'            ´.
      /                \
     ;                 ;´    message = hello, gamers
     |         H       |;    keys = 83 88 85
     ;                 ;| 
     '\               / ;    hexes in message = e a e
      \´.           .' /     
       ´.´-._____.-' .'      sum = 83+e 88+a 85+e
         / /´_____.-'        sum = 97 98 99
        / / /
       / / /                 hidden message = abc
      / / /
     / / /
    / / /
   / / /
   \/_/
`

Input
Line 1: Integer n for the number of keys.
Line 2: keys, which is a list of space-separated decimal integers.
Line 3: String message.
Output
The secret string hidden inside message.
Constraints
8 ≤ n ≤ 12
17 ≤ each value in keys ≤ 116
message will always contain n hexadecimal digits.
Hexadecimal digits in message are all in lower-case.

All characters in the output are guaranteed to be printable ASCII characters.
Example
Input
8
105 93 91 96 91 103 97 100
a thinker sitting in a chair. pondering. making.
Output
skeleton
